title: LOL patcher 7.7
body:
Hello Guys,

Oveer the last 2 days I am constantly trying to update my league of legends client, with no luck. I have tried doing everything from deleting files in lol_air_client to pasting the S_OK file in to every one of the releases folders, however I still get unspecified error during the patching period. Moreover I even tried using a VPN with an IP in Sweden with no real luck. The furthest I have gotten was when  changed to a server in Oceania when there was 1.5gb left to download it just changed to 0 files scanned the percentage went to 99% with it still saying 0 files scanned and left it there like this for good 5 hours, so I guess it just got stuck. I need help.

replies.body: I have found a solution, therefore if anyone has the same issue as me I literally tried everything. Answer for me was: "Uninstalled AVG, complete uninstall" something in AVG Antivirus was blocking the patching. Hope it helps.

You might have a security setting or software that's blocking the patcher from scanning game files to prepare you for updates.  As a first step, go over the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that league is being added as an exception.  You can also download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to make sure your firewalls are auto-configured too.  Let me know if that helps!

Nothing seems to be helping, I tried everything literally everything it always stops on a similar bit not sure if it's the logs or what it is. It usually gets stuck on this one:

004294.186|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::FileSystem::Impl::ArchiveFileBuilder::Write: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/FileSystem/ArchiveFileBuilder.cpp(317): Error while writing archive file (C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/temp/TMP39e52.tmp, 0x052CE6E0)
004294.186|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::FileSystem::Impl::Manager::WriteArchiveFile: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/FileSystem/Manager.cpp(544): Failed to write archive file "C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/temp/TMP39e52.tmp"

Apart from these two there is a few more ERRORS with a similar folder name.

That one doesn't tell me a whole lot, but there should be some more logs provided by the HRT.  Attach them in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our tech team will look into this individually with you.  Hit us up through there, and we'll get back to you!
What exactly do I choose on the Hextech Repair tool, to send you guys the logs?

When you open the HRT, there is an option in the General section to "Gather System & LOL Logs."  This is enabled by default so all you have to do is hit Start.  The info should save to a folder on your desktop, which you can then attach to your ticket. That should do it!
